message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $9500. I believe this is a great value considering the product's quality and features.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'd like to make a counteroffer of my own. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the effort I've put into it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $8750.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9200. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $8800.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9100. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $8900.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9050. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering all the rounds of negotiation, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $8950.
